Text.Language: }sour/ n~noub te ]paryenoc: peca~rwmata pe pencwt/r: acmici m~mof afcw] m~mon: ouoh af,a nennobi nan e~bol.
The golden censer is the Virgin, her aroma is our Savior. She gave birth to Him; He saved us and forgave us our sins.
المجمرة الذهب هى العذراء، وعنبرُها هو مخلِّصُنا، قد ولدتَه وخلَصَنا، وغفرَ لنا خطايانا.
